```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
  hist = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Random Numbers:Q',bin = alt.Bin(maxbins=10)),
    alt.Y('count()')
  )

  list = [df.head(), hist]
  return list

preview_data(data)
```
